Name: Valand
About the game: Valand is a city-building simulator. You have nothing except your arms and legs. However, it can't be very simple. Barbarians are raging in the world and they are hungry for profit and easy money, your safety is above all. Rebuild houses, develop your own army, build a huge fence around your territory and do everything to survive. Game Features: ▪ Dynamic day/night system ▪ Ability to build your own settlement ▪ Creation of an entire army of Vikings, ready to repel enemies ▪ Open world with longship travel option ▪ Economic system with exciting resource earning ▪ Game atmosphere built in the spirit of the Viking Age
